field.label: Host
field.description: Hostserver of the Database e.g. localhost, 0.0.0.0, ...

field.name: note3
field.description: Leave fields blank to disable this option. If activated: READ DESCRIPTION by hovering over the label in front of the field.

field.name: id-mod
field.label: Mod ID
field.description: ID's of the Joomlagroup of which players should become WoW-Mod. (sep. by ',')

field.name: id-gm
field.label: GM ID
field.description: ID's of the Joomlagroup of which players should become WoW-Gamemaster. (sep. by ',')

field.name: id-admin
field.label: Admin ID
field.description: ID's of the Joomlagroup of which players should become WoW-Administrator. (sep. by ',')

field.name: id-ignore-group
field.label: Group ignore ID
field.description: ID's of the Joomlagroup of which players should not become WoW-Mod/Gamemaster/Administrator. (sep. by ',')

field.name: id-ignore-user
field.label: User ignore ID
field.description: ID's of the Joomlagroup of which players should become also WoW-Mod. (sep. by ',')

field.name: note5
field.description: CAUTION: Deleted WoW-Accounts can not be retrieved!

field.name: wowlock
field.label: Lock or Delete WoW-Account when a Joomla-Account gets deleted.
field.description: NOTHING = no changes made in WoW-DB. LOCK = Lock the user in WoW-DB. DELETE = Delete Account from the account table.

field.name: joomlablock
field.label: If set to 'on', the above setting will be used when a Joomla-Account gets blocked.

field.name: wowenable
field.label: If set to 'on', the WoW-Account gets unlocked when a Joomla-Account gets unblocked.
